mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.code, p.url, p.type, p.icon, p.remark, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.label, p.path, p.is_home, p.order_num FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.order_num ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN sys_role sr ON rp.role_id = sr.id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.id
